channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei -- HarmonyOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei -- HarmonyOS

item.title: CVE-2023-39386|2024-10-10T14:06:08.131Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of input parameters being not strictly verified in the PMS module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause newly installed apps to fail to restart.

item.title: CVE-2023-39393|2024-10-10T14:30:08.867Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of insecure signatures in the ServiceWifiResources module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause ServiceWifiResources to be maliciously modified and overwritten.

item.title: CVE-2023-44113|2024-10-10T18:32:25.502Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of missing permission verification for APIs in the Designed for Reliability (DFR) module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2023-39394|2024-10-10T13:49:18.573Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of API privilege escalation in the wifienhance module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause the arp list to be modified.

item.title: CVE-2023-39405|2024-10-10T14:25:55.849Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of out-of-bounds parameter read/write in the Wi-Fi module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause other apps to be executed with escalated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-39383|2024-10-10T14:16:00.993Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of input parameters being not strictly verified in the AMS module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may compromise apps' data security.

item.title: CVE-2023-39391|2024-10-10T13:54:41.514Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of system file information leakage in the USB Service module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2023-39389|2024-10-10T14:37:21.887Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of input parameters being not strictly verified in the PMS module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause home screen unavailability.

item.title: CVE-2023-39382|2024-10-10T14:19:02.446Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Input verification vulnerability in the audio module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause virtual machines (VMs) to restart.

item.title: CVE-2023-39381|2024-10-10T14:20:49.575Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Input verification vulnerability in the storage module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause the device to restart.

item.title: CVE-2023-39396|2024-10-10T14:28:38.710Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Deserialization vulnerability in the input module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-39392|2024-10-10T14:31:21.691Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of insecure signatures in the OsuLogin module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause OsuLogin to be maliciously modified and overwritten.

item.title: CVE-2023-39388|2024-10-10T14:49:34.727Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of input parameters being not strictly verified in the PMS module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause home screen unavailability.

item.title: CVE-2023-6273|2024-10-10T18:31:23.836Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Permission management vulnerability in the module for disabling Sound Booster. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause features to perform abnormally.

item.title: CVE-2023-39384|2024-10-10T14:13:33.955Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of incomplete permission verification in the input method module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause features to perform abnormally.

item.title: CVE-2023-39387|2024-10-10T14:02:20.518Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of permission control in the window management module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause malicious pop-up windows.

item.title: CVE-2023-39385|2024-10-10T14:08:18.847Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of configuration defects in the media module of certain products.. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause unauthorized access.

item.title: CVE-2023-39390|2024-10-10T14:00:16.996Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Vulnerability of input parameter verification in certain APIs in the window management module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause the device to restart.

item.title: CVE-2023-39380|2024-10-10T14:24:16.891Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Permission control vulnerability in the audio module. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may cause audio devices to perform abnormally.

item.title: CVE-2024-9136|2024-09-27T15:09:37.094Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Access permission verification vulnerability in the App Multiplier module Impact: Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2024-47291|2024-09-27T15:12:46.209Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Permission vulnerability in the ActivityManagerService (AMS) module Impact: Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect availability.

item.title: CVE-2024-47294|2024-09-27T15:10:40.364Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Access permission verification vulnerability in the input method framework module Impact: Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect availability.

item.title: CVE-2024-47293|2024-09-27T15:11:29.485Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Out-of-bounds write vulnerability in the HAL-WIFI module Impact: Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect availability.

item.title: CVE-2024-47292|2024-09-27T15:12:13.816Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in the Bluetooth module Impact: Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2024-8298|2024-09-04T02:22:15.826Z -- huawei -- harmonyos
item.description: Memory request vulnerability in the memory management module Impact: Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service confidentiality.

item.description: Vulnerability of PIN enhancement failures in the screen lock module Impact: Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect service confidentiality, integrity, and availability.
